typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		empName as string,
		age as string,
		Deptid as string,
		CountryName as string,
		gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dataemp
dataemp pivot(groupBy(Deptid),
	pivotBy(gender),
	totalcount = count(empid),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot
Pivot sink(input(
		Deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['pivotgenderCount.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Deptid
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink
